unnormalised: Ayurveda, eh? Interesting! My Dadi swears by it. Remember that joint pain she had back in 2022? She went to a clinic in Kerala and after a 14-day Panchakarma, she was dancing at my cousin's wedding on 01/01/2023! Even now at 75, she takes her Chyawanprash every morning at 07:00 hrs. Might be worth checking out for long-term wellness.
normalised: Ayurveda, eh? Interesting! My Dadi swears by it. Remember that joint pain she had back in two thousand and twenty two?
